entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 28.
